001package edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.viewmodel;
002
003import android.util.Log;
004import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
005import androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver;
006import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
007import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
008import androidx.lifecycle.MediatorLiveData;
009import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
010import androidx.lifecycle.Transformations;
011import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
012import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.Board;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.Game;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.Ship;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.Shot;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.model.entity.User;
018import edu.cnm.deepdive.jata.service.JataRepository;
019import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Observable;
020import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.CompositeDisposable;
021import java.util.Arrays;
022import java.util.HashMap;
023import java.util.List;
024import java.util.Map;
025import java.util.stream.Collectors;
026import java.util.stream.IntStream;
027import javax.inject.Inject;
028import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
029
030/**
031 * This GameViewModel provides access (for a UI controller) to the current state of a game and updates
032 * player boards as a game goes on.
033 */
034@HiltViewModel
035public class GameViewModel extends ViewModel implements DefaultLifecycleObserver {
036
037  private static final String TAG = GameViewModel.class.getSimpleName();
038
039  private final JataRepository jataRepository;
040  private final MutableLiveData<Game> game;
041  private final MutableLiveData<Throwable> throwable;
042  private final CompositeDisposable pending;
043  private Observable<Game> gamePoll;
044  private Observable<Throwable> throwablePoll;
045  private final MutableLiveData<Map<Integer, boolean[][]>> pendingShots;
046  private LiveData<Integer> shotLimit;
047  private MutableLiveData<Integer> shotCounter;
048  private MediatorLiveData<Integer> shotsRemaining;
049
050  /**
051   * Constructor for the GameViewModel, implements all private fields.
052   *
053   * @param jataRepository JataRepository
054   */
055   // @noinspection DataFlowIssue
056  @Inject
057  public GameViewModel(JataRepository jataRepository) {
058    this.jataRepository = jataRepository;
059    game = new MutableLiveData<>();
060    shotLimit = Transformations.map(game, (g) ->
061        (int) (g.getBoards()
062            .stream()
063            .filter((board) -> !board.isFleetSunk())
064            .count() - 1));
065    shotCounter = new MutableLiveData<>(0);
066    shotsRemaining = new MediatorLiveData<>();
067    shotsRemaining.addSource(shotLimit,
068        (limit) -> shotsRemaining.setValue(limit - shotCounter.getValue()));
069    shotsRemaining.addSource(shotCounter,
070        (count) -> shotsRemaining.setValue(shotLimit.getValue() - count));
071    throwable = new MutableLiveData<>();
072    pending = new CompositeDisposable();
073    gamePoll = jataRepository.pollGameStatus();
074    throwablePoll = jataRepository.pollThrowable();
075    pendingShots = new MutableLiveData<>(new HashMap<>());
076    pollGame();
077    pollThrowable();
078  }
079
080  /**
081   * Gets the game object.
082   *
083   * @return game
084   */
085  public LiveData<Game> getGame() {
086    return game;
087  }
088
089  /**
090   * Gets all pending shots.
091   *
092   * @return pendingShots
093   */
094  public LiveData<Map<Integer, boolean[][]>> getPendingShots() {
095    return pendingShots;
096  }
097
098  /**
099   * Gets the shot limit for a users turn.
100   * @return shotLimit
101   */
102  public LiveData<Integer> getShotLimit() {
103    return shotLimit;
104  }
105
106  /**
107   * Gets the shots counter for a users turn.
108   * @return shotCounter
109   */
110  public LiveData<Integer> getShotCounter() {
111    return shotCounter;
112  }
113
114  /**
115   * Gets the shots a user has remaining on their turn.
116   * @return shotsRemaining.
117   */
118  public LiveData<Integer> getShotsRemaining() {
119    return shotsRemaining;
120  }
121
122  /**
123   * Gets any throwable needed.
124   *
125   * @return throwable
126   */
127  public LiveData<Throwable> getThrowable() {
128    return throwable;
129  }
130
131  /**
132   * Method used to start a game.
133   *
134   * @param boardSize   int
135   * @param playerCount int
136   */
137  public void startGame(int boardSize, int playerCount) {
138    jataRepository.startGame(new Game(boardSize, playerCount));
139  }
140
141  /**
142   * Sends a poll to check current game for any updates.
143   */
144  public void pollGame() {
145    gamePoll
146        .subscribe(
147            game::postValue,
148            this::postThrowable,
149            () -> {
150            },
151            pending
152        );
153  }
154
155  /**
156   * Sends a poll to check for any throwable messages needed.
157   */
158  public void pollThrowable() {
159    throwablePoll
160        .subscribe(
161            this::postThrowable,
162            this::postThrowable,
163            () -> {
164            },
165            pending
166        );
167  }
168
169  /**
170   * method used to change the placement of a ship before game has started.
171   *
172   * @param ships      List<Ship>
173   * @param boardIndex int
174   */
175  public void changePlacement(List<Ship> ships, int boardIndex) {
176    jataRepository.changePlacement(ships, boardIndex);
177  }
178
179  /**
180   * Method used to change the placement of a ship before game has started.
181   *
182   * @param ships      List<Ship>
183   * @param boardIndex int
184   * @param ship       Ship
185   */
186  public void changePlacement(List<Ship> ships, int boardIndex, Ship ship) {
187    jataRepository.changePlacement(ships, boardIndex, ship);
188  }
189
190  /**
191   * Method used to submit your ships and lock them in for a game.
192   *
193   * @param boardIndex int
194   */
195  public void submitShips(int boardIndex) {
196    //noinspection DataFlowIssue
197    jataRepository.submitShips(game.getValue().getBoards().get(boardIndex).getShips());
198  }
199  /**
200   * Method used to place a shot before firing, on tap it will show a red circle where your shot would
201   * be fired, same spot can be tapped again to remove that shot so it can be placed somewhere else.
202   */
203
204  /**
205   * @noinspection DataFlowIssue
206   */
207  public void toggleShots(int boardIndex, int gridX, int gridY) {
208    int limit = shotLimit.getValue();
209    int count = shotCounter.getValue();
210    Map<Integer, boolean[][]> pendingShots = this.pendingShots.getValue();
211    int boardSize = game.getValue().getBoardSize();
212    boolean[][] boardPendingShots = pendingShots.computeIfAbsent(boardIndex,
213        (index) -> new boolean[boardSize][boardSize]);
214    if (boardPendingShots[gridY - 1][gridX - 1]) {
215      boardPendingShots[gridY - 1][gridX - 1] = false;
216      shotCounter.setValue(count - 1);
217    } else if (count < limit) {
218      boardPendingShots[gridY - 1][gridX - 1] = true;
219      shotCounter.setValue(count + 1);
220    }
221    this.pendingShots.setValue(pendingShots);
222  }
223
224  /**
225   * Method used to submit your shots against other users.
226   */
227  //@noinspection DataFlowIssue
228  public void submitShots() {
229    Map<Integer, boolean[][]> pendingShots = this.pendingShots.getValue();
230    List<Board> boards = game.getValue().getBoards();
231    List<Shot> shotsToSubmit = pendingShots.entrySet()
232        .stream()
233        .flatMap((entry) -> {
234          int boardIndex = entry.getKey();
235          User user = boards.get(boardIndex).getPlayer();
236          int[] rowIndex = {0};
237          return Arrays.stream(entry.getValue())
238              .flatMap((row) -> {
239                rowIndex[0]++;
240                return IntStream.range(0, row.length)
241                    .filter((columnIndex) -> row[columnIndex])
242                    .mapToObj((columnIndex) -> new Shot(user, columnIndex + 1, rowIndex[0], false));
243              });
244        })
245        .collect(Collectors.toList());
246    pendingShots.clear();
247    shotCounter.setValue(0);
248    jataRepository.submitShots(shotsToSubmit);
249  }
250
251  @Override
252  public void onStart(@NotNull LifecycleOwner owner) {
253    DefaultLifecycleObserver.super.onStart(owner);
254    gamePoll = jataRepository.pollGameStatus();
255    throwablePoll = jataRepository.pollThrowable();
256  }
257
258  @Override
259  public void onStop(@NonNull LifecycleOwner owner) {
260    pending.clear();
261    jataRepository.stopPolling();
262    DefaultLifecycleObserver.super.onStop(owner);
263  }
264
265  private void postThrowable(Throwable throwable) {
266    Log.e(TAG, throwable.getMessage(), throwable);
267    this.throwable.postValue(throwable);
268  }
269}
